> <OLD>
>>
>> Hydras: Hydras doged the hit while hie multiple heads bites them where
>> they can, then took his weapon and opened fire
>
>
> The head bites bit hard on VICE GRIP, him howling as they did so!  At close
> range, attempting to use his ELECTRICAL OVERLOAD upon Hydras as he was
> blasted!


CRYOTEK watched the battle, his crimsom optics watching as if
absorbing every detail of the battle. He folded his arms over his
chest, his wings flexing behind his back. He was a master tactician
and chess player learning from others. The question was, was he
learning so as to aid an ally or to deal with an eventual opponant.

There was a look of loss on INFERNO's face as he watched. It was
obvious that he wanted to come to HYDRAS' aid, to take any hits into
himself than allow for HYDRAS to come to any harm. But his obedience
to HYDRAS was far stronger and he stood  still, his body tense and
ready. Should HYDRAS call on him he would fly instantly into action!

BRUTICUS X was in a similar. His body was tense and ready, the small
bat-like wings on his back flexed spasmodically as he looked on, the
flail in his hand seeming to move of its own accord, sparks of energy
popping off its ends.

There was a chuckled from TARANTULUS as he watched a cruel smile on
his face, but he otherwise said nothing.

IGUANUS and WASPINATOR seemed to be the most comfortable with this
turn of events.

IGUANUS just crossed his arms over his chest as he watched, a content
smile spreading across his face. He gave the impression that for him
this was both sport and entertainment.

WASPINATOR just watched as well his smile was a happy one. He looked
at CRYOTEK "Waspinator just glad he not the one taking the blow this
time." he said quietly.

CRYOTEK ignored him as he watched.

(TAG)

Preston
